thread.title: BRIEF-Wins Finance Holdings Says Is Undergoing Review Of Risk Controls For It's Financial Guarantee Business

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wins Finance Holdings Says Is Undergoing Review Of Risk Controls For It's Financial Guarantee Business
text:
May 18 (Reuters) - Wins Finance Holdings Inc:
* WINS FINANCE HOLDINGS INC. REPORTS UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE SIX MONTHS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* WINS FINANCE HOLDINGS INC - UNDERGOING A REVIEW OF RISK CONTROLS FOR COMPANYâ€™S FINANCIAL GUARANTEE BUSINESS AND MAY REDUCE OPERATION OF THIS BUSINESS
* WINS FINANCE HOLDINGS - CONTINUES TO BE CAUTIOUS AS TO OPERATING RESULTS IN FUTURE IN VIEW OF SLOWDOWN OF CHINESE ECONOMY IN REGIONS WHERE CO OPERATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
